name: Arizen
description: Arizen is light API wallet for Horizen with localy stored and encrypted files.

scripts.start: electron-builder install-app-deps && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron .
scripts.pack-linux: electron-builder install-app-deps --platform linux && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --linux
scripts.pack-win: electron-builder install-app-deps --platform win32 && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --win
scripts.pack-mac: electron-builder install-app-deps --platform darwin && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --mac
scripts.build-linux: electron-builder install-app-deps --platform linux && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build-win: electron-builder install-app-deps --platform win32 && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron-builder --win
scripts.build-mac: electron-builder install-app-deps --platform darwin && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron-builder --mac
scripts.testnet: electron-builder install-app-deps && cd app && patch-package --patch-dir ../patches && cd .. && electron . testnet

author: Horizen team <arizen@horizen.io>
